alert.note: Alert for Chase (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 12:44AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chase County through 130 AM CDT... At 1244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cottonwood Falls, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood Falls, Strong City, Bazaar, Elmdale, Matfield Green, Cedar Point, Hymer, Saffordville, Wonsevu, Tallgrass Prairie and Tallgrass Prairie Preserve. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 97 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
